config.tasksPanel.refreshInterval(ms).de: The interval of auto refresh in millisecond (works after restart auto refresh)
config.resourcesPanel.refreshInterval(ms: The interval of auto refresh in millisecond (works after restart auto refresh)
config.commands.user.description: The <user> argument in `squeue`, defaults to `--me`. If your slurm system doesn't support `--me`, please set to `--user <your_username>`
config.commands.sinfoExtraArgs.descripti: Additional arguments for the `sinfo` command. Each key-value pair represents one argument, which must include a leading `-` or `--`. When the `Sinfo Show All Clusters` option is enabled, do not add the -M option again.
config.commands.sinfoShowAllClusters.des: When checked, adds the `-M all` argument to the `sinfo` command. Enable this option if GRES resources in the cluster are not fully displayed
config.label.name: Name
config.tasksPanel.sortBy.description: The key which the tasks sort by
config.resourcesPanel.sortBy.name.descri: Sort By Node and GRES Name
config.resourcesPanel.sortBy.availabilit: Sort By Node and GRES Availability
config.resourcesPanel.sortBy.description: The key which the resources sort by
config.resourcesPanel。groupBy.descriptio: The key which the nodes group by
config.resourcesPanel.sortDirection.desc: Sorting order of Node and GRES
config.tasksPanel.showShortcutKey.descri: Show shortcut key for open log files in task panel
config.tasksPanel.showFilenameOnly.descr: Show filename only or show full path. Affect `command`, `stdout` and `stderr` files.
config.tasksPanel.displayInformation.des: Configure display information for expanded task in tasksPanel
config.tasksPanel.cacheTimeout.descripti: The timeout of the task refresh output cache in millisecond (off when set to 0). This will take effect when multiple people share the host and refresh at the same time, when refresh operations occur too rapidly.
config.resourcesPanel.cacheTimeout.descr: The timeout of the resource refresh output cache in millisecond (off when set to 0). This will take effect when multiple people share the host and refresh at the same time, when refresh operations occur too rapidly.
config.launch.terminal.shellList.descrip: A list of shells to be displayed as candidates when launching the terminal, shown in the specified order.
